resources:
NorthFlurry English Norwegian Language Settings SecondActivity StartActivity "Weather Forecast" "The ultimate weather companion designed to make your daily life easier. Our app delivers accurate, real-time weather forecasts, ensuring you're prepared for \nwhatever Mother Nature has in store." "Get Started" "NorthFlurry Privacy & Terms" "Sun, Rain, or Snow – Know Before You Go!" "Thank you for downloading Let's Begin!" "Loading…" "Search for a location" "Settings" "General Settings" "Unit Settings" "Temperature Units" "Wind Speed Units" "Precipitation Units" "Share the app" "Rate us" "Trouble with the app?" "LottieFiles Attribution" "CC BY 4.0 Attribution" Weather data byOpen-Meteo.com. Open-Meteo is open-source. Source code is available on GitHub under the GNU Affero General Public License Version 3 AGPLv3 or any later version. You can find the license here. "Any good ideas?" "Feels Like" "Rainfall" "Wind Speed" "Visibility" "Humidity" "Dew Point" "Weekly Precipitation" "No precipitation expected for the week" "Weekly UV Index" "The Ultraviolet Index" "The UV index illuminates solar intensity, guiding smart sun protection choices.\n" "0-2: Enjoy gentle rays outdoors with peace of mind.\n" "3-7: Embrace sun-kissed moments wisely, seeking shade and sunscreen during midday.\n" "8 and above: Retreat from high noon intensity, prioritizing safety in shaded retreats." "Weekly Precipitation" "Precipitation is defined as any liquid or solid water particle that falls from clouds and reaches the ground. Drizzle,rain, snow, snow pellets, ice crystals, and hail are some examples of these particles. Essentially, precipitation encompasses all forms of moisture that fall from the sky. This chart demonstrates total precipitation for a week." "air quality index" "current uv index" "Temperature" "Precipitation" "Next 24 Hours" "Day Length" "Daylight Duration" "Upcoming Days" "Expected Today" "Forecast Details" "No Internet Connection" "Oops! It seems like you're not connected to the internet." "Please check your internet connection and try again." "OK" "Search for a location" General Units N/D "No data available for display" "Animations in this app are provided by LottieFiles and are subject to the Lottie Simple License (FL 9.13.21).
